scripts.offline: yarn rm-old-frontend && yarn prepare-yarn-frontend && yarn rm-original-config && yarn install-frontend && yarn test-offline
scripts.prepare-yarn-backend: cd ./backend && yarn config set yarn-offline-mirror-pruning true && yarn config set yarn-offline-mirror ./packages-offline-cache && cd .. && node ./helpers/cp.js ~/.yarnrc C:/Users/user/.yarnrc ./backend/.yarnrc
scripts.prepare-yarn-frontend: cd ./frontend && yarn config set yarn-offline-mirror-pruning true && yarn config set yarn-offline-mirror ./packages-offline-cache && cd .. && node ./helpers/cp.js ~/.yarnrc C:/Users/user/.yarnrc ./frontend/.yarnrc
